milestones.title: ICO
milestones.description: Republic Protocol completes fundraising with lead investors Polychain and FBG Capital.

milestones.title: RenEx Mainnet
milestones.description: Republic Protocol releases its first mainnet, alongside RenEx as the first truly decentralized dark pool to be built on the protocol.

milestones.title: Darknode: Public
milestones.description: Darknodes are released to the public and now anyone can participate in powering the decentralized network.

milestones.title: Republic Protocol Evolved to Ren
milestones.description: Republic Protocol evolves into Ren and expands its scope to offer private and interoperable liquidity.

milestones.title: WBTC Partnership
milestones.description: Ren partners with BitGo and Kyber to begin the WBTC initiative; RenEx becomes a Merchant for WBTC.

milestones.title: Aztec Protocol Partnership
milestones.description: Ren partners with Aztec to incorporate their privacy focused tech into the Ren ecosystem.

milestones.title: Ren's Future in DeFi
milestones.description: Ren core dev team makes significant advancements and introduces RenVM.

milestones.title: RenVM Fee Model Announced
milestones.description: Fee distribution model is upgraded to improve the security and sustainability on the Darknode network.

milestones.title: Hyperdrive
milestones.description: Ren core dev team deploys the Hyperdrive consensus algorithm to bring fast decentralized consensus to RenVM.

milestones.title: RenVM Devnet
milestones.description: RenVM is successfully deployed to Devnet

milestones.title: RenVM Testnet
milestones.description: RenVM is successfully deployed on Testnet

milestones.title: RenVM SDK
milestones.description: RenVM SDK is released. Allowing any developer to bring trustless, decentralized, and permissionless interoperability to their DeFi application.
